tool_description: Aggregates and calculates statistical metrics from individual product ratings including averages, distributions, and quality indicators.

calculate_trends.description: Whether to calculate rating trends over time

timestamps.description: Timestamps for each rating (required if calculate_trends is true)

error_messages: Invalid ratings: All ratings must be integers between 1 and 5.
Mismatched arrays: Ratings and timestamps arrays must have the same length when trends are calculated.
Insufficient data: At least 3 ratings required for meaningful aggregation.
Invalid timestamps: Timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format when provided.
usage: Provide ratings array and product_id. Set calculate_trends to true and provide timestamps array for trend analysis.

rating_distribution.description: Count of ratings for each star level (1-5)
